TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Yohae’, title = Yohae’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yohae’} }

S.FORM: == Yohae' == u sulit nu Hulam 高峰部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hsinchu a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Yohae'. u kasalumaluma' nu Yohae' sa, 61 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 187 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 182 ku tademaw, pakalatu 97%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 5 ku tademaw, pakalatu 3%. u kasabinacadan, Saysia(SaySiyat) 55%, Tayan(Tayal) 39%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%, Sejek(Seediq) 1%, zumazuma 3%. u Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan Yuancumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah. tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2019 a mihcan 1 a bulad pulung sausi (566,129), Pangcah (211,279), Tayan (91,021), Paywan (101,560), Yuwatan (58,994), Rukay (13,390), Puyuma (14,358), Cou (6,668), Saysiat (6,676), Yami (4,635), Saw (803), Kabalan (1,482), Taluku (31,859), Sakizaya (961), Sejek (10,202), Laaluwa (405), Kanakanabu (345), zuma (11,541)

== Yohae' == o solit no Holam 高峰部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hsincho a kowan ko niyazo' no Yohae'. o kasalomaloma' no Yohae' sa, 61 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 187 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 182 ko tademaw, pakalato 97%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 5 ko tademaw, pakalato 3%. o kasabinacadan, Saysia(SaySiyat) 55%, Tayan(Tayal) 39%, Paywan(Paiwan) 1%, Sejek(Seediq) 1%, zomazoma 3%. o Sakizaya a tademaw inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan Yoancomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah, saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah. tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2019 a mihcan 1 a bolad polong saosi (566,129), Pangcah (211,279), Tayan (91,021), Paywan (101,560), Yowatan (58,994), Rokay (13,390), Poyoma (14,358), Coo (6,668), Saysiat (6,676), Yami (4,635), Saw (803), Kabalan (1,482), Taloko (31,859), Sakizaya (961), Sejek (10,202), Laalowa (405), Kanakanabo (345), zoma (11,541)
